TopicTitle: What do you think about my rocket?

Articles.Content:
I tried to send it to mun

But central engine has shutdown premature.

But central engine has shutdown premature.

That's because a few of your laterally attached tanks have fuel lines running from the center tank into them. You also have all your laterally attached tanks attached to each other with fuel lines. This is unnecessary as they will use fuel at the same rate if they have the same engines. Also, your main center engine is gimbaled, so there is no need for the lateral stage to have gimbaled engines as well.

So here's what you do. Swap out the gimbaled engines for the LV-T30 engine which has 15 more thrust each for the same fuel cost, and they weigh less too. Then, run your fuel lines from the lateral tanks to the center tank. Your lateral tanks will all run out of fuel at the same time while keeping the inner tank completely full.

Edited August 13, 2012 by Ziff
Clarity
